name: PrimaryTKAProcedure
title: Primary TKA Procedure
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent primary Total Knee Arthroplasty (TKA) procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes that identify primary TKA procedures. This is a grouping of CPT, HCPCS and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes for revision or partial knee arthroplasty procedures.)

concept.display: Conversion to cemented total knee replacement (procedure)
Conversion to uncemented total knee replacement (procedure)
Total prosthetic replacement of knee joint using cement (procedure)
Total prosthetic replacement of knee joint not using cement (procedure)
Total arthroplasty of knee, geomedic or polycentric (procedure)
Total replacement of left knee joint (procedure)
Total replacement of right knee joint (procedure)
Arthroplasty, knee, condyle and plateau; medial AND lateral compartments with or without patella resurfacing (total knee arthroplasty)
